title: Freezing Tomato Sauce in Mason Jars

items.name: Leave headspace
items.details: Leave some space at the top of the jar for the sauce to expand as it freezes.

items.name: Cool before freezing
items.details: Let the sauce cool to room temperature before putting jars in the freezer to prevent cracking.

items.name: Use freezer-safe jars
items.details: Use mason jars labeled as freezer-safe for best results.
